item.title: Upcoming PS5 and Xbox Game Has Serious Ratchet and Clank Vibes
item.description:
Highlights

  • Akimbot offers a vibrant 3D platforming experience with duo heroes, exciting gameplay, and nostalgic vibes for fans of classic action-adventure games.
  • The teaser trailer for Akimbot showcases playful banter, intense battles, unique movement abilities, and explosive action reminiscent of Ratchet and Clank.
  • With a universe full of robots, customizable options, epic battles, and a focus on lighthearted adventure, Akimbot promises a thrilling intergalactic journey.

Indie developer Evil Raptor has teamed up with PLAION to reveal a first teaser trailer for the upcoming action-adventure shooter Akimbot , which has already received positive response among audiences for its likeness to Ratchet and Clank . Offering a colorful journey with two partnered heroes and gameplay akin to the beloved action-adventure video games synonymous with the PlayStation 2, this upcoming release is one fans of Ratchet and Clank and Jak and Daxter may want to take a closer look at.

Audiences have long-adored 3D action-adventure games, with recent releases like Crash Bandicoot 4: It's About Time and Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart proving particularly successful both critically and commercially. Titles like God of War Ragnarok and Red Dead Redemption 2 have ranked among some of the best action-adventure games of all time, though some fans have lamented their more mature themes. Seeking to satisfy a more lighthearted nostalgic itch for adventure, Akimbot is already striking a positive chord with fans of old-school 3D platformers.

7:37
Related
21 Best Third-Person Action-Adventure Games Of All Time, Ranked
The third-person action-adventure genre is broad and omnipresent, but here are some titles that really stood out among a crowd of copycats.

Transporting players to a universe populated entirely by robots, Akimbot will see fans taking on the role of Exe, an outlaw bot, who has teamed up with his unexpected sidekick, Shipset. The two will venture out on a mission to save the universe from impending doom, which will require them to battle and blast through armies of robots and pilot a spaceship from planet to planet. Players will have a number of unique customization options with exciting unlockables and weapon mods to diversify their gameplay experience. Stunning environments, chaotic enemies, crazy companions, and a high-powered arsenal await players seeking to dive into the intergalactic war in Akimbot .

Akimbot Teaser Trailer Gives Off Ratchet and Clank Vibes

In the Akimbot teaser trailer, fans get a first look at what to expect from this vibrant 3D platforming shooter. The two protagonist characters can be heard bantering playfully back and forth while battling against various enemies, utilizing guns, spaceships, and an array of parkour maneuvers. Wall-jumping, grappling hooks, and even dancing showcase the movement capabilities of the playable characters, while expansive environments, massive enemies, and powerful explosions give fans an idea of what they will be facing in Akimbot . Audiences have already started comparing the title to games like Ratchet and Clank , due in large part to its duo protagonists, sci-fi setting, and humorous dialogue. Interested fans may want to keep an eye out when Akimbot launches later this year.

The PlayStation 2 remains the best-selling console of all time, and many attribute that success to the impressive library of games the console boasted, a large number of which fell under the 3D action-adventure platformer umbrella. With Akimbot already giving strong PS2 vibes and audiences keen to reignite the nostalgic rush from those old-school titles, this upcoming release has plenty to offer for fans of action-adventure games.

item.title: Xbox Game Pass Confirms New Day One Game for May 23
item.description:
Highlights

  • Galacticare joins Xbox Game Pass on May 23, offering subscribers a day one game experience.
  • Galacticare is a sci-fi hospital management game.
  • May 2024 lineup includes titles like Hauntii and Hellblade 2.

A release date trailer has confirmed that day one game Galacticare is coming to Xbox Game Pass on May 23. While multiple games have already been added to the Xbox Game Pass lineup in May, only one of them was a day one release.

The new Xbox Game Pass games for May 2024 were kicked off with the addition of Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition on May 2, followed by Kona 2: Brume on May 7. And then, day one game Little Kitty, Big City was added to Xbox Game Pass on May 9. Little Kitty, Big City is a well-reviewed open world adventure game that has earned praise for its sense of humor and amusing concept.

Related
Rumor: Another Xbox Game Pass Price Hike and More Bad News May Be Coming
A new report suggests that Microsoft is considering another Xbox Game Pass price hike, along with other potential bad news for its subscribers.

Now Xbox Game Pass subscribers have yet another day one game to look forward to in May 2024. It's been confirmed that day one game Galacticare is coming to Xbox Game Pass on May 23, available on PC and Xbox Series X. Anyone not subscribed to Xbox Game Pass should note that Galacticare will also be available on PS5 and through the Epic Games Store and Steam on PC. For those unfamiliar with the game, Galacticare is a sci-fi management sim where players run alien hospitals in space.

New Xbox Game Pass Games for May 2024

  • Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition - May 2
  • Kona 2: Brume - May 7
  • Little Kitty, Big City - May 9
  • Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons - May 14
  • Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 - May 21
  • Galacticare - May 23
  • Hauntii - May 23

Galacticare isn't the only day one game coming to Xbox Game Pass on May 23. Xbox Game Pass subscribers can also look forward to the addition of adventure game Hauntii on that very same day . Hauntii has players exploring the afterlife, which they can do using special paranormal powers. The game's striking art style has helped it stand out among the other new Game Pass additions in May 2024. Xbox Game Pass subscribers will be spoiled for choice with both Hauntii and Galacticare dropping on the same day.

Two other games have been confirmed for the Xbox Game Pass May 2024 lineup: Brothers and Hellblade 2 . First up is the Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons remake , which is joining the service on May 14. This enhanced version of the critically-acclaimed adventure game features improved visuals and co-op support.

The headlining new Xbox Game Pass game for May 2024 is Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 . Hellblade 2 is joining the Xbox Game Pass lineup on May 21, providing subscribers with the long-awaited follow-up to Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice . There are high expectations for Hellblade 2 , and it will be interesting to see if it lives up to the high bar set by the original game.

item.title: May 14 Will Be a Big Day for Overwatch 2 D.Va Fans
item.description:
Highlights

  • Get ready for the Porsche x Overwatch 2 collab next week with a white Macan Turbo Electric skin for D.Va.
  • D.Va's Porsche skin arrives on May 14 in the in-game shop, though some fans are disappointed that other characters are not included in the crossover.

Overwatch 2 's collab with Porsche, which will add a white Macan Turbo Electric skin for D.Va, is finally happening next week. The tenth season of Overwatch 2 introduced an interesting Mirrorwatch theme which sees some of the franchise's heroes and villains swap roles and abilities in a limited time mode. Additionally, the latest DPS hero, Venture, joined the roster, giving players the ability to burrow underground, become invincible, and set up surprise attacks on opposing players from below.

Overwatch 2 's crossover with the popular luxury car brand Porsche was first announced back in March, when it was confirmed to bring a legendary skin to D.Va based on Porsche's electric Macan Turbo car. When Season 10 of Overwatch 2 was first rolling out, the D.Va skin briefly popped back up at the very end of the Venture Forth launch trailer. Now, the Porsche skin is finally ready to make its Overwatch 2 debut next week.

Related
Mirrorwatch Could Be Key to Fishing Overwatch 2’s Mercy Out from the Bottom of the Barrel
With Overwatch 2's Season 10 introducing 'Mirrorwatch,' a mode that alters hero abilities, it could turn out to be the perfect lifeline for Mercy.

On Twitter, Porsche announced that its legendary Macan Turbo D.Va skin will become available to Overwatch 2 players on May 14. The release date was accompanied by a short animated trailer featuring Overwatch 's MEKA pilot Hana Song and her friend Dae-hyun Park. Chased by a pack of flying Gwishin omnics, the two of them rush to Song's Tokki mech in a Porsche Macan Turbo. Upon arriving and seeing the mech out of commission, Hana quickly works to use pieces of the Porsche they arrived in to repair the mech into working condition, giving it an all-new Macan Turbo look in the process.

Overwatch 2 D.Va Porsche Skin Coming May 14

D.Va's Porsche skin will be available for players to purchase in Overwatch 2 's in-game shop , though it's unknown how much it'll cost and whether it'll be bundled with other small items like voice lines, emotes, or player icons. It's also not known whether the collab will be accompanied by a limited-time event, though considering the skin will only be obtainable via the shop, this seems unlikely. Some Overwatch 2 fans are expressing disappointment over the fact that D.Va is the only hero to receive a Porsche skin, naming other large robotic heroes like Bastion, Orisa, and Wrecking Ball as suitable candidates for the Porsche-based skin.

With Overwatch 2 approaching the midway point of Season 10, its limited-time Mirrorwatch mode is looking to wrap up on May 13. The Season 10 midseason patch will arrive a day later, on May 14, which aims to give buffs to Overwatch 2 's tank heroes . Beyond Porsche, Overwatch 2 doesn't have any announced plans for future collabs. Perhaps more will be revealed in the coming months.

item.title: Transformers One Figures Revealed by Hasbro [EXCLUSIVE]
item.description:
Highlights

  • Hasbro has revealed multiple new Transformers One figures.
  • The convertible toys are set to debut as part of three multipacks in summer 2024, presumably ahead of the Transformers One animated movie's premiere.
  • The upcoming products will start at $19.99 and be available exclusively at Target.

Game Rant can exclusively reveal several new Transformers One figures from Hasbro . The newly announced figures will be released as part of three Hasbro multipacks in summer 2024.

Transformers One is an upcoming animated movie that's set to hit the silver screens on September 20, 2024. Produced in collaboration with Paramount and Hasbro, the feature film promises to explore the origins of the Transformers race.

Related
24 Strongest Autobots In The Transformers Movie Franchise
Autobots are not created equal — some are simply stronger than others. In the Transformers movies, these bots rank above the rest.

In preparation for its theatrical release, Hasbro has recently announced a new line of toys, some of which have already been showcased in April 2024. Game Rant can now exclusively reveal three more additions to the upcoming lineup. The most affordable of the lot is the Transformers One Race Changers 2-Pack, which is set to retail at $19.99. This bundle comprises 1.5-inch Optimus Prime /Orion Pax and Megatron/D-16 figures. Not only are both of these transformable, they will actually automatically convert to robot mode when their vehicle forms are crashed into each other.

Hasbro's New Transformers One Figures

Product

Price

Figure Size

Age Rating

Release Date

Availability

Transformers One Race Changers 2-Pack

$19.99

1.5"

5+

Summer 2024

Target

Transformers One Race and Blast 2-Pack

$24.99

5.5"

6+

Transformers One Racing Warrior 3-Pack

$29.99

4.25" (larger one)

Sitting in the middle of the newly unveiled lineup is the $24.99 Transformers One Race and Blast 2-Pack. This bundle includes a 5.5-inch Megatron/D-16 figure that can be converted from its robot form to a Cybertronian tank , as well as a smaller Whirlwing figure. The Megatron model is transformable in 11 steps, while its sidekick can be converted in only three.

The most expensive of the upcoming products is the Transformers One Racing Warrior 3-Pack. Priced at $29.99, this bundle comprises the Optimus Prime/Orion Pax, Megatron/D-16, and Mirage figures. Like the rest of the lineup, all three of these 4.25-inch models are transformable and made to mimic the young character designs from Transformers One . The trio of multi-packs will see Hasbro partner with Target, who will be their exclusive distributor.

The new Transformers One figures are planned to be released in summer 2024, most likely ahead of the movie's late September premiere. Around that time is when Target is expected to receive even more exclusive Hasbro toys based on the upcoming animated film.

item.title: Dragon's Dogma 2 Dev Capcom Records Highest-Ever Game Sales
item.description:
Highlights

  • Capcom broke records with Dragon's Dogma 2 and Street Fighter 6, reaching the highest game sales in company history.
  • The publisher achieved its best-ever fiscal year with 45.89 million game units sold and 152,410 million yen in net sales.
  • Despite industry challenges, Capcom stands out with record profits and promising forecasts for FY2025, bolstered by Monster Hunter Wilds.

In an otherwise challenging time for the industry, Dragon's Dogma 2 developer Capcom has announced recording the highest-ever game sales in company history. Besides Dragon's Dogma 2 , the Japan-based firm launched another major hit, Street Fighter 6 , during fiscal year 2024.

Over the past year, Capcom has tasted significant success with popular franchises, such as Street Fighter and Mega Man , spawning well-received entries. Recently, the publisher's latest release, Dragon's Dogma 2 , also rolled out to massive fanfare and quickly became one of the top-grossing games of Q1 2024 . Thriving on the back of consecutive hits, Capcom ultimately achieved its best-ever fiscal year in terms of game units sold.

Related
Dragon's Dogma 2 Proves Its Next Entry Has One Less Feature to Worry About
Dragon's Dogma 2 sets one standard for the next installment, so now a sequel can focus on improving what the second game missed instead.

In an official blog post , Capcom has revealed that it posted record-breaking sales of 45.89 million game units between April 1, 2023 and March 31, 2024. It also collected record-high net sales of 152,410 million yen ($979.9 million USD), a 21% year-over-year increase. According to the publisher, these boosted figures are down to the success of Dragon's Dogma 2 and Street Fighter 6 as well as "promotional activities" to find new audiences. Moreover, the announcement highlighted its operating income of 57,081 million yen ($366.6 million USD) during FY2024, a 12.3% jump year-over-year.

Overall, these milestones helped Capcom achieve its seventh consecutive year of record-high profits and eleventh consecutive year of operating profit growth. For FY2025, the Japanese company's forecast predicts another record-setting period with 165,000 million yen ($1,059.9 million USD) in net sales and 64,000 million yen ($411.1 million USD) in operating income. There are chances that this forecast may rely significantly on the forthcoming Capcom game Monster Hunter Wilds , which is slated for next year.

Capcom Stands Strong in Testing Times for the Game Industry

Since 2023, the game industry has faced a series of brutal layoffs and studio shutdowns, affecting even the biggest players, such as PlayStation and Xbox. With job cuts across Sega , Gearbox, and others, coupled with the closing down of Tango Gameworks, Arkane Austin, and more studios, 2024 kicked off another rocky year for the industry. However, recent reports show that Capcom is faring comparatively better than many other game companies right now.

Back in March, the Dragon's Dogma developer announced a company-wide salary hike, despite Capcom employees receiving an increment a couple years ago in 2022. Now, the latest earnings report further emphasizes Capcom's impressive performance in spite of the overall industry's tremulous state. Hopefully, as the dust from the layoff wave settles down, more companies will join Capcom in making positive moves and sharing encouraging results.
